comment.body:
@nofish: I probably find a big bug in ZeroSites. If I delete a site I submitted which has some inner address, like [this one](http://192.168.1.110:43110/1GiJUPsfiS3LWCyZj5urW1Rt2q9WwRh4wB/?Post:15:ZeroNet+-+Tips,+tricks+and+beginners%27+questions). The sites I submitted after this one will all get deleted. Repeatable. Hope for a quick fix. Also thx for the nice new site.

And a small problem: if the title of a site is too long, the 'EDIT' button will get hidden.

> [weakish](#comment_5_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR): How can I cancel a downloading download/seed? I have to wait it to be fully downloaded then remove them in ZeroHello files?

You can cancel it by deleting the file from ZeroHello -> File Manager. You may need to hit "Check files" from ZeroHello -> ZeroUp 3-dot menu to remove some "failed files" errors.
